pinyin: gao1 guo3 tang2 yu4 mi3 tang2 jiang1

sentences.english: Measure the treacle accurately as too much will result in a heavy cake.
sentences.chinese: 糖浆的称量一定要准确，糖浆过多会导致蛋糕厚重。

sentences.english: Measure the treacle accurately as too much will result in a heavy cake.
sentences.chinese: 糖浆的称量一定要准确，糖浆过多会导致蛋糕厚重。

sentences.english: This syrup is especially good for dry or tickly coughs.
sentences.chinese: 这种糖浆特别适合干咳或喉咙发痒引起的咳嗽。

sentences.english: In the Indonesia it is served warm with palm sugar syrup that has been flavored with pandanus leaves and ginger.
sentences.chinese: 印尼的豆花会加棕榈树糖浆，用露兜树叶和生姜调味。

sentences.english: Elderberry is usually taken as a liquid (like cough syrup) or a lozenge.
sentences.chinese: 接骨木提取物一般做成液体，如止咳糖浆，或是锭剂。

sentences.english: It can be used in the quality control of Syrupus Sambuci and Granulate Sambuci.
sentences.chinese: 该法为陆英颗粒及陆英糖浆的质量控制提供了依据。

sentences.english: It may seize up and spatter and generally be disagreeable.
sentences.chinese: 糖浆会结块并且飞溅起来，这通常让人恼火。

sentences.english: Cook the syrup until it ropes.
sentences.chinese: 把糖浆一直熬到能拉出黏丝为止。

sentences.english: Technical conditions to produce barely syrup with various fermentative degrees had been studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了生产不同发酵度糖浆的工艺条件。

sentences.english: 'Treacle, ' said the Dormouse, without considering at all this time.
sentences.chinese: “糖浆，”睡鼠这次毫不犹豫地回答。

sentences.english: As a result, some products containing high fructose corn syrup claim to be "all natural."
sentences.chinese: 导致有些含果葡糖浆的商品仍然打着纯天然的旗号。

sentences.english: Are you worried about high-fructose corn syrup in your diet?
sentences.chinese: 您是否在担心饮食中的高果糖玉米糖浆呢？

sentences.english: Drizzle with maple syrup if desired.
Leave to cool and keep for use as syrup for the dough(skin).
sentences.chinese: 放凉，待会用做面团的糖浆。

sentences.english: I'll prescribe you some medicine and a cough syrup.
sentences.chinese: 我给您开点药和止咳糖浆。

sentences.english: Objective Research dry cough expectorant cough syrup- Pharmacodynamic.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究干咳清糖浆的止咳祛痰的药效学。
